item.description:
Antiques on the Green
Saturday, Sept. 18 9:00 am to 3:00 pm
at Amherst Village Green, Amherst, NH
Antiques on the Green

Price: $5 per person

The 15th annual fall antique show and sale “Antiques on the Green”, sponsored by the Historical Society of Amherst, NH, features 35 dealers with items such as country furniture and decorative pieces (stone ware and kitchen items, etc.), architectural and garden items, fine silver and glass, dolls and toys, books, textiles, art and jewelry. Verbal appraisals will be performed free of charge (1 item appraised with each show admission fee of $5) 10:30 to 11:30 am by Jason Hackler, of NH Antique.

Meet at the visitor center parking lot, Everett Turnpike, exit 6 to carpool at 10 am or by the ticket booth in Amherst about 10:30.

We will poke around for a couple of hours and then go for lunch.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Antiques on the Green Amherst, NH
